name: Pooper by Jim Gerrie
description:
POOPER - EXTREM 256

Can be played using the online emulator (use the same instructions above).  Select POOPER.C10

Key input:

   W

A  S  D

You are a dog represented by the & symbol.

The obeject of the game is to avoid the X (Park Keeper).

The park keeper will track you by the trail of poops you leave behind.

Based on a game design by Dr. Beep for the Sinclair ZX81.
